text: Well, I was at work one day I was doing my usual job working on the warehouse floor stocking boxes
keypoint: I was at work stocking and organizing merchandise

text: organizing merchandise I had been working for a few hours it was getting late
keypoint: I worked for hours and felt strange and lightheaded

text: I had been feeling a bit strange a bit lightheaded but chalked it up to hunger not having eaten yet that day
keypoint: I felt lightheaded and blamed it on hunger

text: But then, as I was walking around the warehouse returning items to their proper places I started to feel a strange tightness and pressure in my chest
keypoint: While working, I felt tightness and pressure in my chest

text: I stopped what I was doing leaned against a nearby wall for a bit the pressure only got stronger I could feel my heart pounding in my chest
keypoint: I stopped and leaned against a wall as pressure increased

text: Next thing I know, I started seeing spots I could feel sweat dripping down my forehead my arms I tried to take some deep breaths
keypoint: I saw spots and felt sweat dripping down

text: I just couldn't catch my breath I was really scared didn't know what to do.
keypoint: I couldn't catch my breath and felt scared

text: Suddenly I heard a voice coming from across the warehouse. It was the manager who had seen me called out to me
keypoint: The manager noticed me and called out

text: it seems someone had noticed me was checking to see if I was alright I tried to yell back that something was wrong I couldn't find my voice.
keypoint: I tried to respond but couldn't find my voice

text: The manager started walking towards me I could feel my world going dark I started to drop to the ground luckily the manager got to me in time
keypoint: The manager approached as I started to collapse

text: caught me just before my legs gave out He took me to the staff room sat me down in a chair
keypoint: The manager caught me and took me to the staff room

text: He asked me questions about what was wrong what happened He got me a glass of cold water told me to rest for a bit
keypoint: He asked questions and gave me water to rest

text: After a few minutes the pressure in my chest slowly eased up I started to feel better
keypoint: After resting, the pressure eased and I felt better

text: It turned out I had been having a panic attack I escaped from the situation the help of the quick action of the manager
keypoint: I realized it was a panic attack, helped by the manager

text: It was never a fun experience it really could have been much worse it taught me to check in with myself make sure to properly rest eat to avoid further episodes
keypoint: The experience taught me to rest and eat properly
